item.title: From prosperity to austerity: Trump’s tone shifts ahead of tariff impacts
item.description: Trump has long promised to unleash a “golden age.” Now he is warning that Americans may have to cut back.

item.title: Trump tariffs set off doubts — even in Rust Belt area he pledged to restore
item.description: Trump tariffs draw mixed reaction in Rust Belt as layoffs hit Mack Trucks plant.

item.title: Judge orders officials to certify Democrat’s win for N.C. Supreme Court
item.description: The back-and-forth legal saga has gone on for six months over an election that Justice Allison Riggs won by 734 votes.

item.title: Hegseth orders cuts to Pentagon’s stable of generals and admirals
